messenger2.common.security package¶

security package for encrypting and decrypting data¶

Submodules¶

messenger2.common.security.decript_data module¶

messenger2.common.security.decript_data.decript_data(username, data)¶

decrypt data on client side :param username: user login :param data: encrypted data :return: decrypted data

messenger2.common.security.decript_data.decript_server_data(data)¶

decrypt data on server side :param data: encrypted data :return: decrypted data

messenger2.common.security.decript_data.get_info(key, data)¶

decrypt data with private key :param key: rsa key :param data: encrypted data :return: decrypted data

messenger2.common.security.encript_data module¶

messenger2.common.security.encript_data.encript_data(username_pk, data)¶

encrypt data on server side :param username_pk: user rsa public key :param data: data to encrypt :return: encrypted data

messenger2.common.security.encript_data.encript_server_data(data)¶

encrypt data on client side :param data: data to encrypt :return: encrypted data

messenger2.common.security.encript_data.get_info(pk, data)¶

encrypt data with public key :param pk: rsa public key :param data: data to encrypt :return: encrypted data

messenger2.common.security.hash_password module¶

messenger2.common.security.hash_password.get_hash_from_password(password, salt)¶

get hash from data :param password: user password :param salt: salt :return: string hash password

messenger2.common.security.keys module¶

messenger2.common.security.keys.generate_pair(username, is_client=True)¶

generate rsa keys if they are not created :param username: login :param is_client: bool value if we check on server or client side :return: None

messenger2.common.security.keys.get_client_server_public_key(to_str=False)¶

get public server key from client side :param to_str: bool to get str instead of rsa object :return: rsa object, string or None if there is no key

messenger2.common.security.keys.get_private_key(username, to_str=False)¶

get private key from client side :param username: login :param to_str: bool to get str instead of rsa object :return: rsa object, string or None if there is no key

messenger2.common.security.keys.get_public_key(username, to_str=False)¶

get public key from client side :param username: login :param to_str: bool to get str instead of rsa object :return: rsa object, string or None if there is no key

messenger2.common.security.keys.get_server_private_key(to_str=False)¶

get private server key from server side :param to_str: bool to get str instead of rsa object :return: rsa object, string or None if there is no key

messenger2.common.security.keys.get_server_public_key(to_str=False)¶

get public key from server :param to_str: bool to get str instead of rsa object :return: rsa object, string or None if there is no key

messenger2.common.security.keys.save_server_public_key(server_pk)¶

save public server key onn client side :param server_pk: public rsa server key string :return: None
